title: PES AIML RR campus VS PES CS EC campus
content: The RR campus happens to be much closer to me location wise, however aiml seems like a compromise as compared to core cse; the cutoffs for cs ec campus are quite literally double my rank, which is also discouraging. Should I rather go for msrit ise instead of both? Could someone help me out?

comments.body:
Ec cse would be a good pick if you are ready to face math and wanna go for masters, rr aiml is a decent pick if you just care about placements.

I'd say pes is academically way better than msrit.
How does this involve masters ? They mainly look at coursework. Pes aiml course covers all cse core courses so it shouldn't cause too much of an issue for masters right
some unis don't like specialization courses in undergrad, but yes many don't bother ig
I'd actually enjoy complex math, thanks a lot!
